nextEvent.name: Chicago Bears at Las Vegas Raiders

tickets.description: Chicago Bears at Las Vegas Raiders

injuries.longComment: A mid-August hamstring injury has kept Gordon sidelined for the Bears' first three games of the regular season. He's unlikely to play against the Raiders on Sunday unless he can practice in at least a limited capacity Friday. Nick McCloud should continue to see additional snaps in the Bears' secondary for as long as Gordon is sidelined.
injuries.shortComment: Gordon (hamstring) did not participate in Thursday's practice.

items.headline: Gordon (hamstring) did not participate in Thursday's practice.
items.text: A mid-August hamstring injury has kept Gordon sidelined for the Bears' first three games of the regular season. He's unlikely to play against the Raiders on Sunday unless he can practice in at least a limited capacity Friday. Nick McCloud should continue to see additional snaps in the Bears' secondary for as long as Gordon is sidelined.

injuries.longComment: Edwards was unable to play in the Bears' Week 3 win over the Cowboys due to a hamstring injury that he suffered against the Lions in Week 2. He's opened the week with back-to-back DNPs, and he'll have to practice in at least a limited capacity Friday in order to have a chance at playing against the Raiders on Sunday.
injuries.shortComment: Edwards (hamstring) did not participate in Thursday's practice.

items.headline: Edwards (hamstring) did not participate in Thursday's practice.
items.text: Edwards was unable to play in the Bears' Week 3 win over the Cowboys due to a hamstring injury that he suffered against the Lions in Week 2. He's opened the week with back-to-back DNPs, and he'll have to practice in at least a limited capacity Friday in order to have a chance at playing against the Raiders on Sunday.

injuries.longComment: Loveland left this past Sunday's win against the Cowboys in the second quarter due to a hip injury and wasn't able to return. Since then, the rookie first-round pick hasn't been able to practice this week, giving him one more chance to mix into drills before the Bears potentially make a ruling on his availability for Sunday's game in Las Vegas. If Loveland misses the first game of his career, veteran TE Cole Kmet would be in line for a few more passes from QB Caleb Williams.
injuries.shortComment: Loveland (hip) was a non-participant at Thursday's practice.

items.headline: Loveland (hip) was a non-participant at Thursday's practice.
items.text: Loveland left this past Sunday's win against the Cowboys in the second quarter due to a hip injury and wasn't able to return. Since then, the rookie first-round pick hasn't been able to practice this week, giving him one more chance to mix into drills before the Bears potentially make a ruling on his availability for Sunday's game in Las Vegas. If Loveland misses the first game of his career, veteran TE Cole Kmet would be in line for a few more passes from QB Caleb Williams.

injuries.longComment: One day removed from being limited due to a groin injury Wednesday, Kmet didn't have any practice restrictions, while rookie TE Colston Loveland remained sidelined due to the hip issue that he suffered this past Sunday against the Cowboys. If Loveland is inhibited or sidelined Sunday at Las Vegas, Kmet would be in line for a bump in volume in the Bears' passing game.
injuries.shortComment: Kmet (groin) practiced in full Thursday.

items.headline: Kmet (groin) practiced in full Thursday.
items.text: One day removed from being limited due to a groin injury Wednesday, Kmet didn't have any practice restrictions, while rookie TE Colston Loveland remained sidelined due to the hip issue that he suffered this past Sunday against the Cowboys. If Loveland is inhibited or sidelined Sunday at Las Vegas, Kmet would be in line for a bump in volume in the Bears' passing game.

injuries.longComment: Swift maintained his activity level from Wednesday as he deals with a hip injury, leaving him just one more opportunity to prove his health ahead of the weekend. Friday's practice report will reveal whether or not he has a designation ahead of Sunday's game against the Raiders. Through three weeks this season, Swift is averaging 17 touches for 70.7 yards from scrimmage per game while scoring one touchdown.
injuries.shortComment: Swift (hip) practiced in a limited capacity Thursday.

items.headline: Swift (hip) practiced in a limited capacity Thursday.
items.text: Swift maintained his activity level from Wednesday as he deals with a hip injury, leaving him just one more opportunity to prove his health ahead of the weekend. Friday's practice report will reveal whether or not he has a designation ahead of Sunday's game against the Raiders. Through three weeks this season, Swift is averaging 17 touches for 70.7 yards from scrimmage per game while scoring one touchdown.

injuries.longComment: Jackson was sidelined for Sunday's game versus the Cowboys due to a hamstring issue, but it appears he's over it, as preparation for Week 4 kicks into gear. He projects to play most if not all of his snaps on special teams Sunday at Las Vegas.
injuries.shortComment: Jackson (hamstring) was a full participant at practice Wednesday.

items.headline: Jackson (hamstring) was a full participant at practice Wednesday.
items.text: Jackson was sidelined for Sunday's game versus the Cowboys due to a hamstring issue, but it appears he's over it, as preparation for Week 4 kicks into gear. He projects to play most if not all of his snaps on special teams Sunday at Las Vegas.

injuries.shortComment: questionable

items.headline: questionable
items.text: questionable

injuries.longComment: questionable
injuries.shortComment: questionable

items.headline: questionable
items.text: questionable

injuries.longComment: Johnson flew to Philadelphia to receive a consultation on core-muscle surgery. The procedure has been determined to be the best course of action for the 2020 second-rounder, which will provide him the opportunity to return during the second half of the regular season depending on his rehab progress.
injuries.shortComment: Johnson (groin) will undergo core-muscle surgery this week, Scott Bair of Marquee Sports Network reports.

items.headline: Johnson (groin) will undergo core-muscle surgery this week, Scott Bair of Marquee Sports Network reports.
items.text: Johnson flew to Philadelphia to receive a consultation on core-muscle surgery. The procedure has been determined to be the best course of action for the 2020 second-rounder, which will provide him the opportunity to return during the second half of the regular season depending on his rehab progress.

injuries.longComment: With Jaylon Johnson (groin) on injured reserve, Wright moved into a starting role and immediately had a dominant IDP performance. When Chicago plays pass-heavy opponents, Wright could be a strong fantasy option.
injuries.shortComment: Wright tallied nine tackles in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.

items.headline: Wright tallied nine tackles in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.
items.text: With Jaylon Johnson (groin) on injured reserve, Wright moved into a starting role and immediately had a dominant IDP performance. When Chicago plays pass-heavy opponents, Wright could be a strong fantasy option.

injuries.longComment: Robinson was quiet in Chicago's first two games, but he came up big against the Cowboys. Until the defensive end can put together some consistency, he'll be tough to trust as an IDP option.
injuries.shortComment: Robinson recorded four tackles, including 1.0 sacks, in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.

items.headline: Robinson recorded four tackles, including 1.0 sacks, in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.
items.text: Robinson was quiet in Chicago's first two games, but he came up big against the Cowboys. Until the defensive end can put together some consistency, he'll be tough to trust as an IDP option.

injuries.longComment: Sweat is averaging 2.66 tackles per game and finally found the sack column. Although the veteran has been a weak IDP option, he has the talent to go on a multi-game sack streak, making him a boom-or-bust fantasy option.
injuries.shortComment: Sweat posted two tackles, including 1.0 sacks, in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.

items.headline: Sweat posted two tackles, including 1.0 sacks, in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.
items.text: Sweat is averaging 2.66 tackles per game and finally found the sack column. Although the veteran has been a weak IDP option, he has the talent to go on a multi-game sack streak, making him a boom-or-bust fantasy option.

injuries.longComment: Through three games, Sewell has games with 11, nine and five tackles. Sewell clearly has the ability to offer a high fantasy floor, especially if he is able to demonstrate consistency over the a multi-game span.
injuries.shortComment: Sewell tallied 11 stops in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.

items.headline: Sewell tallied 11 stops in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.
items.text: Through three games, Sewell has games with 11, nine and five tackles. Sewell clearly has the ability to offer a high fantasy floor, especially if he is able to demonstrate consistency over the a multi-game span.

injuries.longComment: Byard has averaged 4.5 tackles over Chicago's first two games before posting a strong performance against Dallas. Last year, the veteran posted at least six stops in all but three games. It's possible that Byard can build on this game and become a higher-floor IDP.
injuries.shortComment: Byard picked off a pass while posting seven tackles in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.

items.headline: Byard picked off a pass while posting seven tackles in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.
items.text: Byard has averaged 4.5 tackles over Chicago's first two games before posting a strong performance against Dallas. Last year, the veteran posted at least six stops in all but three games. It's possible that Byard can build on this game and become a higher-floor IDP.

injuries.longComment: Edmunds was solid in Chicago's first two games while recording seven stops in each contest, but the linebacker had an eruption against the Cowboys. Edmunds will remain a high-floor IDP option with occasional upside.
injuries.shortComment: Edmunds intercepted two passes and registered 15 tackles in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.

items.headline: Edmunds intercepted two passes and registered 15 tackles in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.
items.text: Edmunds was solid in Chicago's first two games while recording seven stops in each contest, but the linebacker had an eruption against the Cowboys. Edmunds will remain a high-floor IDP option with occasional upside.

injuries.longComment: In Week 1, Zaccheaus posted 42 receiving yards, but he has just 36 yards over the last two games. Still, the veteran has at least four targets in each contest, and as long as he retains the No. 3 receiver role, he could continue to post limited yardage most weeks.
injuries.shortComment: Zaccheaus caught three of four targets for 24 yards and added 12 rushing yards on his only carry in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.

items.headline: Zaccheaus caught three of four targets for 24 yards and added 12 rushing yards on his only carry in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.
items.text: In Week 1, Zaccheaus posted 42 receiving yards, but he has just 36 yards over the last two games. Still, the veteran has at least four targets in each contest, and as long as he retains the No. 3 receiver role, he could continue to post limited yardage most weeks.

injuries.longComment: Monangai didn't handle a rushing attempt in Week 1, but with the Bears playing in blowouts the last two weeks, he has averaged 6.5 carries over that span. Until Monangai establishes a role in close games, it's unclear how much work he'll see as the No. 2 running back behind D'Andre Swift.
injuries.shortComment: Monangai rushed six times for 16 yards and caught a four-yard pass in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.

items.headline: Monangai rushed six times for 16 yards and caught a four-yard pass in the Bears' 31-14 win over the Cowboys on Sunday.
items.text: Monangai didn't handle a rushing attempt in Week 1, but with the Bears playing in blowouts the last two weeks, he has averaged 6.5 carries over that span. Until Monangai establishes a role in close games, it's unclear how much work he'll see as the No. 2 running back behind D'Andre Swift.

injuries.longComment: Burden was relatively quiet through his first two games as a pro, but he caught a 65-yard touchdown on a flea-flicker late in the first quarter as the highlight of his potential breakout performance Sunday. He also chipped in a 29-yard reception to set up another Chicago touchdown two possessions later. Burden was still prioritized behind Rome Odunze and DJ Moore in terms of targets, which casts doubt on the sustainability of his role moving forward. However, Moore has been used primarily in the short areas of the field, so Burden could be another explosive playmaking option to complement Odunze.
injuries.shortComment: Burden recorded three receptions on three targets for 101 yards and a touchdown in Sunday's 31-14 win over the Cowboys. He added one rush for seven yards.

items.headline: Burden recorded three receptions on three targets for 101 yards and a touchdown in Sunday's 31-14 win over the Cowboys. He added one rush for seven yards.
items.text: Burden was relatively quiet through his first two games as a pro, but he caught a 65-yard touchdown on a flea-flicker late in the first quarter as the highlight of his potential breakout performance Sunday. He also chipped in a 29-yard reception to set up another Chicago touchdown two possessions later. Burden was still prioritized behind Rome Odunze and DJ Moore in terms of targets, which casts doubt on the sustainability of his role moving forward. However, Moore has been used primarily in the short areas of the field, so Burden could be another explosive playmaking option to complement Odunze.

injuries.longComment: Moore continued to be overshadowed by Rome Odunze, but he also lost out to Luther Burden in the blowout win. Moore still finished second on the team in targets, but his longest gain went for only 12 yards as he was targeted exclusively in short areas of the field. He saved his day with a four-yard touchdown catch late in the fourth quarter, his first trip to the end zone this season. Nevertheless, Moore has yet to see more than six targets in a game and has topped 50 receiving yards only once in three contests.
injuries.shortComment: Moore recorded four receptions on five targets for 21 yards and a touchdown in Sunday's 31-14 win over the Cowboys. He added three rushes for seven yards.

items.headline: Moore recorded four receptions on five targets for 21 yards and a touchdown in Sunday's 31-14 win over the Cowboys. He added three rushes for seven yards.
items.text: Moore continued to be overshadowed by Rome Odunze, but he also lost out to Luther Burden in the blowout win. Moore still finished second on the team in targets, but his longest gain went for only 12 yards as he was targeted exclusively in short areas of the field. He saved his day with a four-yard touchdown catch late in the fourth quarter, his first trip to the end zone this season. Nevertheless, Moore has yet to see more than six targets in a game and has topped 50 receiving yards only once in three contests.

injuries.longComment: Odunze made an immediate impact, hauling in a 35-yard touchdown on Chicago's first offensive possession. He was relatively quiet thereafter, though he still managed a pair of additional receptions for 13 and 14 yards. Odunze has found the end zone in every game this season while surpassing 60 yards in each of his last two contests.
injuries.shortComment: Odunze recorded three receptions on seven targets for 62 yards and a touchdown in Sunday's 31-14 win over Dallas.

items.headline: Odunze recorded three receptions on seven targets for 62 yards and a touchdown in Sunday's 31-14 win over Dallas.
items.text: Odunze made an immediate impact, hauling in a 35-yard touchdown on Chicago's first offensive possession. He was relatively quiet thereafter, though he still managed a pair of additional receptions for 13 and 14 yards. Odunze has found the end zone in every game this season while surpassing 60 yards in each of his last two contests.

injuries.longComment: Williams has consistently looked sharp during the scripted portions of Chicago's game plans to begin the season, which remained the case Sunday when he connected for a 35-yard touchdown with Rome Odunze on the opening drive. He carried his strong performance through the entire game, however, and matched his career high with four passing scores while also completing four passes of more than 30 yards. In addition to the explosiveness, Williams didn't take a sack or turn the ball over in one of the most well-rounded showings of his young career.
injuries.shortComment: Williams completed 19 of 28 passes for 298 yards, four touchdowns and zero interceptions in Sunday's 31-14 win over the Cowboys. He added five rushes for 12 yards.

items.headline: Williams completed 19 of 28 passes for 298 yards, four touchdowns and zero interceptions in Sunday's 31-14 win over the Cowboys. He added five rushes for 12 yards.
items.text: Williams has consistently looked sharp during the scripted portions of Chicago's game plans to begin the season, which remained the case Sunday when he connected for a 35-yard touchdown with Rome Odunze on the opening drive. He carried his strong performance through the entire game, however, and matched his career high with four passing scores while also completing four passes of more than 30 yards. In addition to the explosiveness, Williams didn't take a sack or turn the ball over in one of the most well-rounded showings of his young career.

injuries.longComment: Santos' field goal came from 30 yards out. The veteran is now two of three on field-goal tries and 10-for-10 on extra-point attempts in 2025. If the Chicago offense can stay hot, he should be in line for enough chances to make him fantasy relevant.
injuries.shortComment: Santos made his only field-goal attempt and all four of his extra-point tries in Sunday's 31-14 win over the Cowboys.

items.headline: Santos made his only field-goal attempt and all four of his extra-point tries in Sunday's 31-14 win over the Cowboys.
items.text: Santos' field goal came from 30 yards out. The veteran is now two of three on field-goal tries and 10-for-10 on extra-point attempts in 2025. If the Chicago offense can stay hot, he should be in line for enough chances to make him fantasy relevant.

injuries.longComment: Per Courtney Cronin of ESPN.com, Keenum will serve as the Bears' emergency third quarterback behind Caleb Williams and Tyson Bagent. That means Keenum is prohibited from playing Sunday unless Williams and Bagent are both removed due to injury, illness or ejection.
injuries.shortComment: Keenum (coach's decision) is inactive for Sunday's game against the Cowboys.

items.headline: Keenum (coach's decision) is inactive for Sunday's game against the Cowboys.
items.text: Per Courtney Cronin of ESPN.com, Keenum will serve as the Bears' emergency third quarterback behind Caleb Williams and Tyson Bagent. That means Keenum is prohibited from playing Sunday unless Williams and Bagent are both removed due to injury, illness or ejection.

injuries.longComment: Amegadjie had been dealing with an elbow injury throughout the past week, though it's unclear when he first picked it up. The 23-year-old will now be forced to miss at least four games before he's eligible to make his return.
injuries.shortComment: The Bears placed Amegadjie (elbow) on injured reserve Saturday.

items.headline: The Bears placed Amegadjie (elbow) on injured reserve Saturday.
items.text: Amegadjie had been dealing with an elbow injury throughout the past week, though it's unclear when he first picked it up. The 23-year-old will now be forced to miss at least four games before he's eligible to make his return.
